nodes.text: Cyrillia was the homeworld of the Cyrillians, in the Expansion Region of the galaxy. It was a very industrialized world where Serv-O-Droid, Inc. constructed its DUM pit droids in large quantities.

Cyrillia was explored sometime between 20,000 BBY and 15,000 BBY during the Great Manifest Period and settlement of Trailing Sectors. It fell into the area of space known as The Slice. By 4 ABY, the planet had become an Imperial fortress world. The Empire abandoned the planet in 6 ABY, after the Battle of Reytha.
By 25 ABY, Cyrillia boasted a population of 1 to 10 billion Cyrillians.
